title: Research Project
requirements: For students in MSc Research Medicine
description: In this course, a student is required to meet with his/her supervisor regularly who provides necessary guidance and supervision to write up a thesis and monitors the student's academic progress.
outcome: The student will conduct a substantial and in-depth research project in biomedical or clinical sciences under supervision from a professor/professors. The project should include extensive literature review and practical/laboratory/clinical work. A dissertation of not less than 8,000 words will have to be submitted. A short presentation will also be required.
syllabus: To be determined by individual professors subject to the topic of research to be conducted by the student.
required_readings: To be provided by individual professors based on the topic of research to be conducted by the student.
recommended_readings: To be provided by individual professors based on the topic of research to be conducted by the student.
